Name: Strike Arrow III
Desc:
Shoots arrows several times in a row after using Strike Arrow II to effectively suppress enemies. Temporarily enables you to reuse the skill after using Strike Arrow II and also activates Arrow Fragment.
Required Skill: Lv. 20 Strike Arrow II or above

H.Old:
Consumes 10 MP and attacks up to 6 enemies at 240% Damage 5 times.
[Passive Effects: Strike Arrow Damage +79%p, Strike Arrow II Damage +79%p, [Revelation] Strike Arrow Damage +120%p, Arrow Fragment +60%p]
